summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2205, for the improvement of East 66th Street, Est 67th Street, and East 69th Street, each from Weeden Place to 10th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, and by attaching fire hydrants to the existing water mains, under Ordinance No. 22193 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
